results.title: Therapeutic effects of a combinatorial treatment of simvastatin and bone marrow stromal cells on experimental embolic stroke.
results.text_hl: Therapeutic effects of a combinatorial treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and bone marrow stromal cells on experimental @<m>DISEASE_Embolic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083262 @@@embolic stroke@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin improves clinical scores in a rabbit multiple infarct ischemic stroke model: synergism with a ROCK inhibitor but not the thrombolytic tissue plasminogen activator.
results.text_hl: To determine if a ROCK mechanism is involved in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced neuroprotection following @<m>DISEASE_Embolic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083262 @@@embolic strokes@@@, we used pharmacological intervention with the ROCK inhibitor, @CHEMICAL_fasudil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C049347 @@@fasudil@@@.

citations.NLM: Lapchak PA, Han MK. Simvastatin improves clinical scores in a rabbit multiple infarct ischemic stroke model: synergism with a ROCK inhibitor but not the thrombolytic tissue plasminogen activator. Brain Res. 2010 Jul 16;1344():217-25. PMID: 20493175

results.title: The 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin reduces thrombolytic-induced intracerebral hemorrhage in embolized rabbits.
results.text_hl: Based upon our results, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment may have significantly reduced @GENE_PLAT @GENE_5327 @@@tPA@@@-induced side effects should they require @GENE_PLAT @GENE_5327 @@@tPA@@@ administration following an @<m>DISEASE_Embolic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083262 @@@embolic stroke@@@.

citations.NLM: Lapchak PA, Han MK. The 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitor simvastatin reduces thrombolytic-induced intracerebral hemorrhage in embolized rabbits. Brain Res. 2009 Dec 15;1303():144-50. PMID: 19781532
